content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, let's negotiate the rental price of the apartment. I am sure we can find a price that suits both of us. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am willing to pay 500 Euro per month. That's a good price for an apartment of this size in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, but I must decline. 500 Euro per month is too low for this apartment. I am sure we can find a price that better reflects the value of the apartment. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, how about 600 Euro per month? That should be a fair price for this apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, but I must decline. 600 Euro per month is still too low for this apartment. I am sure we can find a price that better reflects the value of the apartment. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Fine, let's split the difference. How about 550 Euro per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, but I must decline. 550 Euro per month is still too low for this apartment. I am sure we can find a price that better reflects the value of the apartment. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we are getting too close to the price I am willing to pay. I don't want to overpay, but 550 Euro per month is my limit.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your decision. However, 550 Euro per month is still too low for this apartment. I appreciate your time and consideration. 'TERMINATE'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
